name: Next Gen Zombie Invasion
description:
50% Discount !! Happy halloween

Next-Gen Zombie Invasion is a new generation of graphics arcade game for wireless VR. With visual effects never seen on the Oculus Quest before. Your mission is to survive and find a boat on this huge island to escape !

Get ready to face your fears.

The game is pre-release version, I'd like to get feedbacks and reviews to know if as a player you like the gameplay and graphics.

Features

Hdr Volumetric Lighting, Screen space reflection, Screen space ambient occlusion, Bloom, Single player campaign, Huge world without loading, Multiple Weapons, Bullet time ( Y button )

Choose your difficulty :

Katana : easy mode

Rifle, Pistol : medium mode
